summary: This is the tale of twins; one a sheriff, the other a ruthless outlaw and rapist.
cast: Craig Hill|Ágata Lys|Frank Braña|Nuccia Cardinali|Lorenzo Piani|Gilberto Galimberti|Francisco Sanz|Ernesto Vañes|Liliana Chiari|María Vico|Antonio Padilla|Alfonso Sarlo|Silvio Klein|Attilio Pelegatti|Marisa Bertoni|Giuseppe Pandolfi|Giuseppe Scarcella|Dolores Calò|Omero Capanna|Franz Colangeli|Romano Milani|Vezio Natili|Jesús Tordesillas
title: La máscara de cuero
